insert into oa_provider_directory (name, type, content, linkman, phone, address, postcode, assess_table, ability_table, provide_table, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abilityTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provideTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update oa_provider_directory set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assess_table = #{assessTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ability_table = #{abilityTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provide_table = #{provideTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, content, linkman, phone, address, postcode, assess_table, ability_table, provide_table, remark, create_time, update_time from oa_provider_directory where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
